function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2-specific RNA in untreated and treated wastewater samples","Impact":"Potential for the spread of the virus through contaminated wastewater","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced wastewater treatment technologies to eliminate the virus-specific RNA","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems and disinfection technologies","People":"Public using the municipal wastewater systems","Owner":"Municipal authorities and wastewater treatment plant operators"},{"Description":"Variability in PCR measurements and storage conditions for RNA extraction","Impact":"Inconsistent results and potential for inaccurate detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater samples","Mitigation":"Standardization of PCR protocols and improved storage conditions for RNA extraction","Technologies":"Standardized PCR protocols and improved storage facilities for RNA extraction","People":"Laboratory technicians and researchers conducting PCR analysis","Owner":"Laboratory and research institutions"},{"Description":"Disturbing factors accumulated during sample processing that could influence analysis results","Impact":"Potential for false positive or false negative results in PCR analysis of wastewater samples","Mitigation":"Utilization of improved sample processing techniques and rigorous quality control measures","Technologies":"Advanced sample processing techniques and rigorous quality control measures","People":"Research teams and laboratory technicians processing wastewater samples","Owner":"Laboratory and research institutions"}]}
